summary: Provides an asynchronous WebSocket client that connects to the Probit cryptocurrency exchange, authenticates the user, subscribes to live market streams, and translates incoming messages into standardized structures such as order books, tickers, trades, balances, and order status updates.
business_intent: Allows developers and trading systems to receive realâ€‘time market information and account activity from Probit, supporting automated trading, market monitoring, and portfolio management.
